summary: The customer has been having issues with their Contoso Wireless phone for several weeks, including poor sound quality, dropped calls, slow response times, freezing, and blurry photos. The agent apologized for the inconvenience and asked for the model number of the phone so that they can investigate further. The customer provided the model number and additional information about their experience. The agent promised to investigate further and get back to the customer with a resolution as soon as possible.
